mapper.insert:
Oracle
insert into RAIN
DATATIME,
PERIODRAIN,
DIFFERENCERAIN,
TOTALRAIN,
DAYRAIN,
TRANSTYPE,
MESSAGETYPE,
RECVDATATIME,
`STATE`,
#{datatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{periodrain,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{differencerain,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalrain,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dayrain,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{transtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{messagetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{recvdatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

insert into RAIN (STATIONID,DATATIME,PERIODRAIN,DIFFERENCERAIN,TOTALRAIN,DAYRAIN,TRANSTYPE,MESSAGETYPE,RECVDATATIME,STATE)
( select #{item.stationid}, to_date(#{item.datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{item.periodrain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.differencerain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalrain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.dayrain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.transtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.messagetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, to_date(#{item.recvdatatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{item.state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} from dual )
mapper.update:
begin
update RAIN
PERIODRAIN = #{item.periodrain},
DIFFERENCERAIN = #{item.differencerain},
TOTALRAIN = #{item.totalrain},
DAYRAIN = #{item.dayrain},
TRANSTYPE = #{item.transtype},
MESSAGETYPE = #{item.messagetype},
RECVDATATIME = to_date(#{item.recvdatatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),
STATE = #{item.state}
where STATIONID= #{item.stationid} AND DATATIME = to_date(#{item.datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
;end;
mapper.select:
select t.STATIONID, t.DATATIME, t.PERIODRAIN, t.DIFFERENCERAIN, t.TOTALRAIN, t.DAYRAIN, t.TRANSTYPE, t.MESSAGETYPE, t.RECVDATATIME， t.STATE from RAIN t where 1=1
and STATIONID = #{stationid}
and DATATIME = to_date(#{datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and DATATIME >= to_date(#{strttime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') >= DATATIME
order by t.STATIONID
